org.openmap4u

Class Defaults

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openmap4u.Defaults
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable

    public final class Defaults
extends Object
implements Serializable
    Is a bean that contains all default values like units, styles, ... . It allows to override the defaults with user defined custom values (if necessary).

    OpenMap4u om4u = new OpenMap4u();
    om4u.getDefaults().setWorldUnits(Length.M);
    om4u.getDefaults().setDrawingUnits(Length.CM);
    ...
    Author:
    Michael Hadrbolec
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
